directions: Cook 1 cup bulgur as the label directs; cool. Mix with 1 diced peeled cucumber, 1 cup chopped parsley, 1/2 cup each chopped mint and scallions, 1/4 cup olive oil, 3 tablespoons lemon juice, 1 1/4 teaspoons salt, 1/2 teaspoon allspice and some pepper. Sprinkle with minced jalapeno and crumbled feta.
title: Tabbouleh
